name: jewish-holiday-today
0:
”Alexa, ask Hebrew Calendar if today is a holiday”
”Alexa, use Hebrew Calendar to tell me if it is a holiday”
”Alexa, can you tell me if it is a holiday from Hebrew Calendar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hebrew calendar
des: Answers whether or not today is a Jewish holiday, speaking the name of the holiday if it is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
